    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(java.lang.String filename)
                 throws LoggingException
        Use this method to initialize logging per ini-file. Within the given ini-file you can specify log-target (a file or stdout) for each log-channel separately.
        Format of inifile:
        NameOfLogChannel = Group[;Group;Group;...]
        group := LogTarget,LogLevel
        LogTarget := stdout|Filename
        LogLevel := OFF|SEVERE|WARNING|INFO|FINE|FINER|FINEST|ALL

        Example: file logging.ini
        log.channel.one = stdout,INFO
        log.channel.two = log/test.log,ALL;stdout,SEVERE
        log.channel.three = log/test.log,SEVERE;stdout,INFO

        Example: Usage in code
        Logging.init("logging.ini");
        Logger.getLogger( "log.channel.one" ).info("Hello world (should be visible only on stdout");
        Logger.getLogger( "log.channel.two" ).info("Hello world (should be visible only on log/test.log");
        Logger.getLogger( "log.channel.two" ).severe("Hello world (should be visible on stdout and in log/test.log");
        Parameters:
        filename - - name of the inifile
        Throws:
        LoggingException
